title: Cops Face "Serious Disorder" In British Cities Over Murders Of Children
content: Renewed street violence in British cities on Saturday left several police officers injured as they faced a fourth day of unrest following the murder of three young girls in northwest England earlier in the week.
summary: Renewed street violence in British cities on Saturday left several police officers injured as they faced a fourth day of unrest following the murder of three young girls in northwest England earlier in the week.

title: "Trump Running Scared": Kamala Harris' Campaign On Fox News Debate Offer
content: Kamala Harris's campaign branded Donald Trump "scared" Saturday after he proposed to change the presidential debate schedule ahead of a rally in Georgia.
summary: Kamala Harris's campaign branded Donald Trump "scared" Saturday after he proposed to change the presidential debate schedule ahead of a rally in Georgia.

title: "Leave Now": Nations Ask Citizens In Lebanon As Risk Of Regional War Looms
content: Many nations including the US, Britain and France have asked their nationals living in Lebanon to leave the country immediately, amid fears of all-out war between Israel and Iran-backed Hezbollah and a broader regional conflict.
summary: Many nations including the US, Britain and France have asked their nationals living in Lebanon to leave the country immediately, amid fears of all-out war between Israel and Iran-backed Hezbollah and a broader regional conflict.

title: Bangladesh Students Step Up Protests To Press PM's Resignation
content: Bangladeshi student leaders on Saturday said they would carry on a planned nationwide civil disobedience campaign until Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina resigned following last month's deadly police crackdown on protesters.
summary: Bangladeshi student leaders on Saturday said they would carry on a planned nationwide civil disobedience campaign until Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina resigned following last month's deadly police crackdown on protesters.

title: Israeli Strike Kills 10 In Gaza School Sheltering Displaced: Hamas
content: At least 10 Palestinians were killed on Saturday in an Israeli strike on a school sheltering displaced persons in Gaza City's Sheikh Radwan neighborhood, the Hamas run-government media office said.
summary: At least 10 Palestinians were killed on Saturday in an Israeli strike on a school sheltering displaced persons in Gaza City's Sheikh Radwan neighborhood, the Hamas run-government media office said.

title: Middle East On The Brink Of Israel-Iran War, US Bolsters Forces: 10 Points
content: Iran said it expects Lebanon's Tehran-backed Hezbollah group to hit deeper inside Israel and no longer be confined to military targets after Israel killed the Hezbollah commander. Hezbollah has been exchanging near-daily fire with Israeli forces.
summary: Iran said it expects Lebanon's Tehran-backed Hezbollah group to hit deeper inside Israel and no longer be confined to military targets after Israel killed the Hezbollah commander. Hezbollah has been exchanging near-daily fire with Israeli forces.

title: Hamas Chief Killed By Short-Range Projectile With 7-kg Warhead: Iran
content: Hamas' leader Ismail Haniyeh was killed in Tehran by a short-range projectile with a warhead of about 7 kg, Iran's Revolutionary Guards said in a statement on Saturday.
summary: Hamas' leader Ismail Haniyeh was killed in Tehran by a short-range projectile with a warhead of about 7 kg, Iran's Revolutionary Guards said in a statement on Saturday.

title: Air France, Transavia Halt Beirut Flights Over Security Concerns
content: Flights to Beirut by Air France and low-cost carrier Transavia France will remain suspended until at least Tuesday due to "security" concerns in the region, parent company Air France-KLM said.
summary: Flights to Beirut by Air France and low-cost carrier Transavia France will remain suspended until at least Tuesday due to "security" concerns in the region, parent company Air France-KLM said.

title: "It's Stealing": Music Labels' AI Suits Create New Copyright Puzzle For US Courts
content: Prompted by Reuters to make "an Americana song in the style of Tift Merritt," the artificial intelligence music website Udio instantly generated "Holy Grounds," a ballad with lyrics about "driving old backroads".
summary: Prompted by Reuters to make "an Americana song in the style of Tift Merritt," the artificial intelligence music website Udio instantly generated "Holy Grounds," a ballad with lyrics about "driving old backroads".

title: Hezbollah To Choose Targets, Strike "Deeper" Inside Israel: Iran
content: Iran said on Saturday it expects Lebanon's Tehran-backed Hezbollah group to hit deeper inside Israel and no longer be confined to military targets after Israel killed the Hezbollah military commander.
summary: Iran said on Saturday it expects Lebanon's Tehran-backed Hezbollah group to hit deeper inside Israel and no longer be confined to military targets after Israel killed the Hezbollah military commander.

title: Khaled Meshaal To Zaher Jabarin: Top Contenders For Hamas Top Post
content: Palestinian militant group Hamas is preparing to choose a political leader after the killing of Ismail Haniyeh in a Wednesday attack in Tehran blamed on Israel.
summary: Palestinian militant group Hamas is preparing to choose a political leader after the killing of Ismail Haniyeh in a Wednesday attack in Tehran blamed on Israel.

title: 37 Killed In Al-Shabaab Suicide Bomb Attack In Somalia's Capital
content: An Al-Shabaab suicide bomber and gunmen attacked a busy beach in the Somali capital Mogadishu killing 37 people and wounding scores more, officials said on Saturday, in one of the deadliest strikes in the East African country in months.
summary: An Al-Shabaab suicide bomber and gunmen attacked a busy beach in the Somali capital Mogadishu killing 37 people and wounding scores more, officials said on Saturday, in one of the deadliest strikes in the East African country in months.

title: Iran Begins Purge After Hamas Chief's Assassination In Tehran
content: In response to the killing of Hamas leader Ismail Haniyeh in its capital Tehran, Iran has arrested over two dozen individuals, including high-ranking intelligence officers, military officials, and staff at a military-run guesthouse in the capital.
summary: In response to the killing of Hamas leader Ismail Haniyeh in its capital Tehran, Iran has arrested over two dozen individuals, including high-ranking intelligence officers, military officials, and staff at a military-run guesthouse in the capital.

title: McDonald's Worker Sets Restaurant On Fire Over Customer Frustration
content: Authorities emphasized the severity of arson and its risks to public safety, crediting the collaboration of local and federal agencies for McGregor's prosecution.
summary: Authorities emphasized the severity of arson and its risks to public safety, crediting the collaboration of local and federal agencies for McGregor's prosecution.

title: Turkey's Viral Olympian Took Up Shooting After Divorce? A Fact-check
content: Turkish shooter Yusuf Dikec, who won a silver medal at the Paris Olympics 2024 in the 10m air pistol competition, became a viral sensation for his "gearless" look.
summary: Turkish shooter Yusuf Dikec, who won a silver medal at the Paris Olympics 2024 in the 10m air pistol competition, became a viral sensation for his "gearless" look.

title: Donald Trump Agrees To Debate Kamala Harris On September 4
content: Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump said late Friday he had agreed with Fox News to debate Democratic Vice President Kamala Harris on September 4.
summary: Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump said late Friday he had agreed with Fox News to debate Democratic Vice President Kamala Harris on September 4.

title: Donald Trump Attacks Kamala Harris' Black-Indian Identity As Polls Near
content: With the US Presidential election in its last stretch, Donald Trump and Kamala Harris are leaving no stone turned to win voters.
summary: With the US Presidential election in its last stretch, Donald Trump and Kamala Harris are leaving no stone turned to win voters.

title: Russian Spy Couple Returns From Slovenia, Children Don't Recognise Putin
content: Their parents were posing as an Argentine couple in Slovenia and were later convicted of spying. The two children accompanied them to Moscow on Thursday from Turkey
summary: Their parents were posing as an Argentine couple in Slovenia and were later convicted of spying. The two children accompanied them to Moscow on Thursday from Turkey

title: Middle East Alert For Indians As Iran-Israel Tensions Escalate
content: Tensions have escalated in the Middle East after Iran and the groups it supports vowed revenge for the killing of top Hamas and Hezbollah leaders.
summary: Tensions have escalated in the Middle East after Iran and the groups it supports vowed revenge for the killing of top Hamas and Hezbollah leaders.

title: 2 Iran Agents, Bombs In 3 Rooms: Inside Mossad's Kill Op For Hamas Chief
content: Israel's elite intelligence agency Mossad enlisted Iranian security agents to plant explosives in a building in Tehran where armed Palestinian group Hamas's political leader Ismail Haniyeh was staying, The Telegraph reported.
summary: Israel's elite intelligence agency Mossad enlisted Iranian security agents to plant explosives in a building in Tehran where armed Palestinian group Hamas's political leader Ismail Haniyeh was staying, The Telegraph reported.
